name: Strangebird shootemup
description:
Hello!

It's a demo which I made for qbparty 2016 demoscene meeting. I won the 3rd prize with it. Please not that i'm only 16 years old and I still have to learn a lot and the game might have some bugs. I just uploaded it to here because i want to show it to people and see their opinion so please leave a comment even if it's negative, let me know what shall I improve. Also i'm from hungary and sorry if my english is poor :/

Controls:

wasd - move

left click - shot

right click - shot rocket

p - pause
